info.description: Submit workflows to be run on REANA Cloud
info.title: REANA Server

get.description: This resource provides configuration needed by Reana-UI.

200.description: Configuration information to consume by Reana-UI.

get.summary: Gets information about Reana-UI configuration user.

200.description: Ping succeeded.

403.description: Request failed. User token not valid.

get.description: Initiate connection to GitLab to authorize accessing the authenticated user's API.

200.description: This resource return all projects owned by the user on GitLab in JSON format.

403.description: Request failed. User token not valid.

delete.description: Remove an existing REANA webhook from a project on GitLab

parameters.description: The GitLab webhook id of the project.
parameters.name: hook_id

403.description: Request failed. User token not valid.

404.description: No webhook found with provided id.

delete.summary: Delete an existing webhook from GitLab

post.description: Setup a webhook for a GitLab project on GitLab.

403.description: Request failed. User token not valid.

post.summary: Set a webhook on a user project from GitLab

200.description: Ping succeeded. Service is running and accessible.
List of user secrets.

type.description: How will be the secret assigned to the jobs, either exported as an environment variable or mounted as a file.

403.description: Request failed. Token is not valid.

get.summary: Get user secrets. Requires an user access token.

delete.description: This resource deletes the requested secrets.

parameters.description: Optional. List of secrets to be deleted.
parameters.name: secrets

schema.description: List of secret names to be deleted.

200.description: Secrets successfully deleted.

schema.description: List of secret names that have been deleted.

items.description: Name of the secret that have been deleted.

403.description: Request failed. Token is not valid.

404.description: Request failed. Secrets do not exist.

schema.description: List of secret names that could not be deleted.

items.description: Name of the secret which does not exist.

post.description: This resource adds secrets for the authenticated user.

parameters.description: Whether existing secret keys should be overwritten.
parameters.name: overwrite

parameters.description: Optional. List of secrets to be added.
parameters.name: secrets

type.description: How will be the secret assigned to the jobs, either exported as an environment variable or mounted as a file.

403.description: Request failed. Token is not valid.

409.description: Request failed. Secrets could not be added due to a conflict.

application/json.message: The submitted secrets api_key, password, username already exist.

200.description: Cluster health status information.

put.description: This resource allows the user to create an empty REANA access token and mark it as requested.

200.description: User information correspoding to the session cookie sent in the request.

401.description: Error message indicating that the uses is not authenticated.

403.description: Request failed. User token not valid.

put.summary: Requests a new access token for the authenticated user.

get.description: This resource return all current workflows in JSON format.

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Optional flag to show more information.
parameters.name: verbose

parameters.description: Sort workflows by creation date (asc, desc).
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Filter workflows by list of statuses.
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Include progress information of the workflows.
parameters.name: include_progress

parameters.description: Include size information of the workspace.
parameters.name: include_workspace_size

200.description: Request succeeded. The response contains the list of all workflows.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. User does not exist.

get.summary: Returns list of all current workflows in REANA.

post.description: This resource is expecting a REANA specification in JSON format with all the necessary information to instantiate a workflow.

parameters.description: Name of the workflow to be created. If not provided name will be generated.
parameters.name: workflow_name

parameters.description: Remote repository which contains a valid REANA specification.
parameters.name: spec

parameters.description: REANA specification with necessary data to instantiate a workflow.
parameters.name: reana_specification

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

201.description: Request succeeded. The workflow has been created.

application/json.message: The workflow has been successfully created.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. User does not exist.

post.summary: Creates a new workflow based on a REANA specification file.

put.description: This resource moves files within the workspace. Resource is expecting a workflow UUID.

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

200.description: Request succeeded. Message about successfully moved files is returned.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. Either User or Workflow does not exist.

get.description: This resource shows the differences between the assets of two workflows. Resource is expecting two workflow UUIDs or names.

parameters.description: Required. Analysis UUID or name of the first workflow.
parameters.name: workflow_id_or_name_a

parameters.description: Required. Analysis UUID or name of the second workflow.
parameters.name: workflow_id_or_name_b

parameters.description: Optional flag. If set, file contents are examined.
parameters.name: brief

parameters.description: Optional parameter. Sets number of context lines for workspace diff output.
parameters.name: context_lines

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

200.description: Request succeeded. Info about a workflow, including the status is returned.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. Either user or workflow does not exist.

post.description: This resource is expecting a workflow to close an interactive session within its workspace.

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

200.description: Request succeeded. The interactive session has been closed.

application/json.message: The interactive session has been closed

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. Either user or workflow does not exist.

application/json.message: Either user or workflow does not exist.

get.description: This resource reports the disk usage of a workflow. Resource is expecting a workflow UUID and some parameters .

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Optional. Additional input parameters and operational options.
parameters.name: parameters

200.description: Request succeeded. Info about the disk usage is returned.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming data specification seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. User does not exist.

get.summary: Get disk usage of a workflow.

get.description: This resource reports the status of a workflow. Resource is expecting a workflow UUID.

schema.description: List of step names to get logs for.

200.description: Request succeeded. Info about a workflow, including the status is returned.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming data specification seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. User does not exist.

get.summary: Get workflow logs of a workflow.

post.description: This resource is expecting a workflow to start an interactive session within its workspace.

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Type of interactive session to use.
parameters.name: interactive_session_type

image.description: Replaces the default Docker image of an interactive session.

200.description: Request succeeded. The interactive session has been opened.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. Either user or workflow does not exist.

application/json.message: Interactive session type jupiter not found, try with one of: [jupyter].

post.summary: Start an interactive session inside the workflow workspace.

get.description: This resource reports the input parameters of a workflow. Resource is expecting a workflow UUID.

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

200.description: Request succeeded. Workflow input parameters, including the status are returned.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. Either User or Analysis does not exist.

get.description: This resource returns the REANA workflow specification used to start the workflow run. Resource is expecting a workflow UUID.

200.description: Request succeeded. Workflow specification is returned.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. User does not exist.

get.summary: Get the specification used for this workflow run.

post.description: This resource starts the workflow execution process. Resource is expecting a workflow UUID.

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Optional. Additional input parameters and operational options.
parameters.name: parameters

200.description: Request succeeded. Info about a workflow, including the execution status is returned.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. Either User or Workflow does not exist.

409.description: Request failed. The workflow could not be started due to a conflict.

application/json.message: Workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1 could not be started because it is already running.

501.description: Request failed. The specified status change is not implemented.

application/json.message: Status resume is not supported yet.

get.description: This resource retrieves the file list of a workspace, given its workflow UUID.

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

200.description: Requests succeeded. The list of files has been retrieved.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. Analysis does not exist.

post.description: This resource is expecting a file to place in the workspace.

parameters.description: Required. File to add to the workspace.
parameters.name: file

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Optional flag to return a previewable response of the file (corresponding mime-type).
parameters.name: preview

200.description: Request succeeded. File successfully transferred.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

post.summary: Adds a file to the workspace.

delete.description: This resource is expecting a workflow UUID and a filename existing inside the workspace to be deleted.

parameters.description: Required. Name (or path) of the file to be deleted.
parameters.name: file_name

parameters.description: The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

200.description: Requests succeeded. The file has been downloaded.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

get.description: This resource is expecting a workflow UUID and a file name existing inside the workspace to return its content.

parameters.name: file_name

parameters.name: access_token
